headerDisplay: Connect your Pando kitchen hood to HomeKit. You need a Pando account — the same email and password you use in the [Pando app](https://www.pando.es/tecnologia21/#airlink).
footerDisplay: All hoods linked to your Pando account will be discovered automatically.

username.title: Pando Account Email
username.description: The email address you use to log into the Pando app.

password.title: Pando Account Password
password.description: Your Pando app password. Stored locally in the Homebridge config — never sent anywhere except the Pando API.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollingInterval.description: How often to poll the Pando cloud for state updates. Lower values give faster feedback but increase API traffic. Default: 30 seconds.
